Text.Page:
We believe the leaders reported to someone named Dakanius.

Once Dakanius hears that you defeated them, he'll want revenge-if not on you, then on us.

We need to fortify the town, and to warn our outpost commanders.

I can't spare any troops, so I'll need you to head out to Vanguard Outpost and let Hendry know to expect trouble."As ordered."
Talk to Justarius about getting a guide. You'll find him and his squad near the entrance of the town.
Jodoc informed you that once Dakanius discovers the assault leaders are dead, he would take revenge on Crescentia. You went to Vanguard Outpost in Oblivion Woods to warn Hendry.

So, I hear that even as a recruit, you've done some pretty amazing things for the Valkyon Federation. And now you need a guide to the Vanguard Outpost?

Maybe we can help each other. Hendry keeps asking for reinforcements, but these keeners just aren't ready. They've got the nerve, but not the experience, and I can't train them fast enough.

So let's do this: I'll tell one of my recruits to guide you to the outpost...but you'll really be protecting him from all the undead between here and there.

Does that work for you?"Sounds good to me."

Good. Keep him alive, but don't be afraid to let him get his hands dirty. Okay?

Hey! I need a volunteer to escort this to Vanguard Outpost!

I... I'll show you to the outpost. And I'll keep you safe! There are a lot of undead monsters between here and there...

...a lot...

Welcome to the front line in the never-ending battle against the undead.

Thanks for getting my soldier here in one piece. These recruits mean well, but they have no training, and less sense.
